meanings.sent1: The phut of the distant fireworks echoed through the night.
meanings.sent2: I heard a soft phut as the balloon slowly deflated.
meanings.sent3: The phut of the old car horn made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The phut of the cork popping signaled the start of the celebration.
meanings.sent5: The phut of the book closing marked the end of the story.

meanings.definition: To make a dull, muffled sound.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally knocked over the vase, causing it to phut on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The firewood started to phut as it burned in the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to phut quietly while sneaking up on the bird.
meanings.sent4: The leaky faucet continued to phut throughout the night.
meanings.sent5: The old radio would phut and crackle before finally playing music.
